name: One Direction (Shot out games)
description:
• Arcade Style Top Down Game with way too much clicking
  • Left Click Mouse as pesky cubes spawn to earn points and clear out room
  • Eliminate all cubes for Big Bonus
  • Space Bar to launch your ship in the direction it is facing and destroy opposing missiles
  • When your ship is not in launch all missiles must be avoided
  • After the launch the ship is covered by a purple orb during cool down time leaving you vulnerable to damage longer
  • Each cube you get rid of increases your cool down time to launch again
  • Complete both levels for maximum score
  • Reach the all time leaders board
    • CONTROLS
      • MOVE : WASD
      • ELIMINATE CUBES: Left Mouse Click
      • LAUNCH TO DESTROY MISSILES: Space Bar / Right Mouse Click
      • ZOOM CAMERA : Mouse Scroll / Up and Down Arrow
    • GAMEPLAY TIPS
      • Aim carefully to gain big point Streak and Combo Bonuses
      • The Cubes only collide with borders and can not cause damage
      • It does not matter where you click to destroy spawned cubes
